title: Digital Vintage Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Digital Vintage watch face for android Wear
description: Your life in time with this classic timeless piece of smart watch making. This digital watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic digital watch and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design. Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★ Time (Digital dial)★ Date, month ★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain ★  Special dimmed mode with green glow lightMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
Your life in time with this classic timeless piece of smart watch making. This digital watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic digital watch and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design.
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Time (Digital dial)
★ Date, month
★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain
★ Special dimmed mode with green glow light

More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: If I could give this watch face negative stars i would .. the picture shows 24 hour display .. I paid for this .. no 24 hour !!!!! What a rip off
Nice face but wanting more Really liked the retro look but a watch battery meter icon would be useful.
Great watch face Love the application but needs a couple more options, e.g. green mode, maybe weather etc
What happened to 24hr display? Where did the 24hr display go? Not very good or cool without it.
It's good but I can't make the screen green? Help?
